name: manectite
effect: Held: Allows Manectric to Mega Evolve into Mega Manectric.
short_effect: Held: Allows Manectric to Mega Evolve into Mega Manectric.

flavor_text.sun_moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Manectric hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Manectric hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Manectric hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
